title.rendered: Brant Fabric Classic Sofa Cum Bed in Light Grey

content.rendered:
Experience unparalleled comfort and sophistication with the 3 Seater brant sofa. Its spacious design, measuring 84.25 inches in width, 30.71 inches in depth, and 30.71 inches in height, provides ample room for relaxation. Crafted with a robust Kikkar wood frame, this sofa ensures long-lasting durability.

The secret to its exceptional comfort lies in the high-quality Multi-Foam filling, offering plush support for hours of lounging. You have the freedom to choose between jute or velvet upholstery, allowing you to tailor the sofa’s appearance to match your unique style. The color options are customizable, ensuring a seamless integration into your existing decor.

For added peace of mind, the 3 Seater brant comes with a 5-10 years company foam warranty, demonstrating the manufacturer’s commitment to quality. Elevate your living space with this stunning sofa that seamlessly combines comfort, durability, and aesthetic appeal.

 

Product Details Dimensions (in inches)
– Width 84.25 inches
– Depth 30.71 inches
– Height 30.71 inches
Material Sturdy Kikkar wood frame
Foam Premium Multi-Foam
Upholstery Jute or Velvet
Color Optional selection
Warranty 5-10 years company foam warranty

excerpt.rendered:
The 3 Seater Brant Fabric Classic Sofa Cum Bed is the epitome of comfort and style. Crafted with a sturdy Kikkar wood frame and premium Multi-Foam, it offers exceptional durability and support. Choose from jute or velvet upholstery in your preferred color. Enjoy peace of mind with a 5-10 years company foam warranty. Elevate your living space with this luxurious sofa set.

*Note: All Of Our Items Are Made to Order.*
